mapper.insert: insert into deskassign (deskAssignKey, memberNumber, deskStoreNumber, waitingNumber, preorderExist) values (#{deskAssignKey}, #{memberNumber}, #{deskStoreNumber}, #{waitingNumber}, #{preorderExist})
mapper.select: select count(*) from deskassign where memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and deskStoreNumber = #{deskStoreNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from deskassign where memberNumber = #{memberNumber} and deskStoreNumber = #{deskStoreNumber}
